summary: This bill, the 'Blocking Lawless Open Border Cities and States Act of 2025' (BLOC Act), aims to restrict certain federal infrastructure funding to states and their subdivisions deemed 'sanctuary jurisdictions.' It mandates these jurisdictions to notify the Secretary of Homeland Security at least 48 hours before releasing an alien from custody if the alien is unlawfully present, the Secretary has notified the detaining entity, and the alien has been in custody for at least 48 hours. The bill amends Title 23 of the United States Code and defines infrastructure projects based on existing regulations.
